name: Lunar Engine
description:
This 'game' is a technical demo to test out what is possible with my custom engine. This engine was made over the course of 7 months using OpenGL. There isn't much gameplay-wise, but this project implements many modern features in game such as: physically-based-rendering, volumetric rendering, frustum culling, etc.

The demo video for the project can be found here: 

Source code for the project can be found here: https://github.com/Kihz17/LunarEngine

I can be contacted at: mitchdawdy@gmail.com
